inclusion.criterion: Measurable disease of multiple myeloma at the time of baseline values for disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: >= 200 mg of monoclonal protein in the urine on 24 hour electrophoresis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status (PS) 0, 1 or 2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Recovered from toxicity of previous chemotherapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Prior autologous or allogeneic bone marrow/peripheral blood stem cell transplant
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: More than two prior regimens for therapy of MM
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Myocardial infarction within 6 months prior to enrollment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Seroreactivity for human immunodeficiency virus (HIV), human T-lymphotropic virus (HTLV) I or II, hepatitis B virus (HBV), hepatitis C virus (HCV)
exclusion.label: not_met
